titles: Viro admodum colendo quia doctissimo ac æque eruditissimo, tamque perantiquis majorum ceris, & imaginibus quam sua juxta virtute valde generoso Richardo Busbæo, S.T.B. et celeberrimæ per Britanniam Scholæ Westmonasteriensis archididascalo & philopono dignissimo Gulielmus Ogstonus SS. TD. hoc illi epitaphium successori & discipulo dudum Lamberti Osbolstoni consecrari voluit.
author: Ogston, William.
notes: Text in two columns, enclosed in mourning border.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
